p: Numerous studies showed that the aqueous and methanol extract of leaf and seed oil of basil enhances immune response by increasing T‚Äêhelper and natural killer cells, lymphocyte count, phagocytic activity, neutrophil count, antibody titer, and so on against the variety of infection as a defense mechanism (Jamshidi & Cohen, 2017; Pattanayak, Behera, Das, & Panda, 2010; Vasudevan, Kashyap, & Sharma, 1999).
